alert.note: Alert for South Lincoln County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 08 at 12:57PM MST until January 10 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TUESDAY TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...South Lincoln County. * WHEN...From 5 AM Tuesday to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Gusty winds and snowfall will bring very low visibility conditions Tuesday night and Wednesday, with considerable threat to travel conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The worst conditions are expected Tuesday afternoon through early Wednesday morning. See weather.gov/riverton/winter for more details on snow potential.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
